org.togglz.servlet.spi.CSRFToken

    Package Description
    org.togglz.servlet.spi

    • Uses of CSRFToken in org.togglz.servlet.spi

      Methods in org.togglz.servlet.spi that return CSRFToken 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CSRFToken CSRFTokenProvider.getToken(HttpServletRequest request)
      Returns the CSRF token or null if there is no token to include.
